bwwExcerpt: Cilento delivers on his promise. His staging faithfully pays homage to the choreographer’s work through a relevant lens for a new generation. For anyone looking to tap their toes and clap their jazz hands at a Broadway show, Bob Fosse’s Dancin’ delivers. Melissa

keyPhrases.quote: For anyone looking to tap their toes and clap their jazz hands at a Broadway show, Bob Fosse's Dancin' delivers.
